description:
Get comments of a post and some basic information about the comments. Before you can use this preset, you have to fetch posts. See the preset named "Get Facebook posts".

See https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.10/comment to add or change the fields-parameters.

Notice: If you add more fields, also add them in the column setup to make the data visible in the nodes view.
name: Get comments
